channel.title: Sports

item.title: Braden Smith on his RECORD BREAKING Primetime Performance in No. 5 Purdue's Win Over Wisconsin
item.description: Purdue Boilermakers' Braden Smith broke the Big Ten all-time assists record in a tough win over the Wisconsin Badgers.

item.title: No NFC South champ until Sunday after Bucs beat Panthers

item.title: Ravens-Steelers winner takes AFC North: 'This is going to be a slugfest'
item.description: For years, this feud has become must-watch TV, and Sunday won't be any different in a "winner-takes-all" game.

item.title: College football transfer portal: Tracking who's on the move
item.description: The transfer portal opened Jan. 2. We're keeping tabs on players who enter and where they're headed.
